snippet: Ms. Isaacs was elected to a third one-year term as president of the group that grants the annual Academy Awards.
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences president Cheryl Boone Isaacs is reelected to third term.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Isaacs was elected to a third one-year term as president of the group that grants the annual Academy Awards.

headline.main: Cheryl Boone Isaacs Re-Elected President of Motion Picture Academy
headline.print_headline: Motion Picture Academy Re-elects Its President
